DOC.brief_summary: This study will investigate the safety and efficacy of different doses of an investigational drug (MK0518) as a therapy for HIV-infected patients failing current antiretroviral therapies.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of an Investigational Drug in Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV)-Infected Patients Failing Current Antiretroviral Therapies (0518-005)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Patient must be HIV positive with Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV) Ribonucleic Acid (RNA) values that are within ranges required by the study Patient must be currently on antiretroviral therapy (ART) Patient less than 18 years of age Additional exclusion criteria will be discussed and identified by the study doctor
